Package com.example.ex3_eylon_mazor

Class MyThreads

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
com.example.ex3_eylon_mazor.MyThreads
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MyThreads
extends java.lang.Thread
The type My threads. create a thread with the user id. url to check and the current depth to check for the recursion.

    void run()
    The main function of the thread that try to connect to the url, and if it success - count to number of images, send the data to main DB - and continue to create pool thread for all the Urls in his Url (if pass the stop condition of the recursion). ***************************** why thread pool?

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      The main function of the thread that try to connect to the url, and if it success - count to number of images, send the data to main DB - and continue to create pool thread for all the Urls in his Url (if pass the stop condition of the recursion). ***************************** why thread pool? why let to single thread do all the work if I can to create more? to increase performance and still limit the number of threads. *****************************
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread

    • isFinish

      public boolean isFinish()
      check if the main thread is finish. (unfortunately, more accurate than isAlive() method)
      Returns:
      the boolean
